data.name: Accessibility.Call
data.value: call 03459 33 55 77 (Monday to Friday, 8.30am to 5pm)

data.name: Accessibility.ChangeColours
data.value: change colours, contrast levels and fonts

data.name: Accessibility.ComplianceStatus
data.value: Compliance status

data.name: Accessibility.ContactingUs
data.value: Contacting us by phone or visiting us in person

data.name: Accessibility.ContactUs
data.value: contact us

data.name: Accessibility.DefraIsCommitted
data.value: Defra is committed to making its website accessible, in accordance with the Public Sector Bodies (Websites and Mobile Applications) (No. 2) Accessibility Regulations 2018.

data.name: Accessibility.Email
data.value: email

data.name: Accessibility.EnforcementProcedure
data.value: Enforcement procedure

data.name: Accessibility.EqualityAdvisorySupportService
data.value: contact the Equality Advisory and Support Service (EASS)

data.name: Accessibility.FeedbackAndContact
data.value: Feedback and contact information

data.name: Accessibility.FindOutHowTo
data.value: Find out how to

data.name: Accessibility.HasAdviceOn
data.value: has advice on making your device easier to use if you have a disability.

data.name: Accessibility.HowAccessible
data.value: How accessible this website is

data.name: Accessibility.IfYouAreNotHappy
data.value: If you’re not happy with how we respond to your complaint

data.name: Accessibility.IfYouNeedInformation
data.value: If you need information on this website in a different format like an accessible PDF, large print, easy read, audio recording or braille:

data.name: Accessibility.LastReviewed
data.value: It was last reviewed on

data.name: Accessibility.NavigateUsingKeyboard
data.value: navigate most of the website using just a keyboard

data.name: Accessibility.NavigateUsingReader
data.value: listen to most of the website using a screen reader (including the most recent versions of JAWS, NVDA and VoiceOver)

data.name: Accessibility.NavigateUsingSpeech
data.value: navigate most of the website using speech recognition software

data.name: Accessibility.OurOfficesHaveAudio
data.value: Our offices have audio induction loops, or if you contact us before your visit we can arrange a British Sign Language (BSL) interpreter.

data.name: Accessibility.PreparationOfThis
data.value: Preparation of this accessibility statement

data.name: Accessibility.ReportingProblems
data.value: Reporting accessibility problems with this website

data.name: Accessibility.TechnicalInformation
data.value: Technical information about this website’s accessibility

data.name: Accessibility.TheEqualityAndHumanRights
data.value: The Equality and Human Rights Commission (EHRC) is responsible for enforcing the Public Sector Bodies (Websites and Mobile Applications) (No.2) Accessibility Regulations 2018 (the ‘accessibility regulations’).

data.name: Accessibility.TheTestWasCarriedOut
data.value: The test was carried out by the Digital Accessibility Centre to the WCAG 2.1 standard.

data.name: Accessibility.ThisAccessibilityStatement
data.value: This accessibility statement applies to the Regulator service.

data.name: Accessibility.ThisStatementWasPrepared
data.value: This statement was prepared on

data.name: Accessibility.ThisWebsiteIsPartially
data.value: This website is partially compliant with the

data.name: Accessibility.ThisWebsiteIsRun
data.value: This website is run by the Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs (Defra).

data.name: Accessibility.ThisWebsiteWas
data.value: This website was last tested on

data.name: Accessibility.Title
data.value: Accessibility statement for Regulator service

data.name: Accessibility.WebContentAccessibility
data.value: Web Content Accessibility Guidelines version 2.1 AA standard

data.name: Accessibility.WeKnowSomeParts
data.value: We know some parts of this website are not fully accessible:

data.name: Accessibility.WeProvideAText
data.value: We provide a text relay service for people who are D/deaf, hearing impaired or have a speech impediment.

data.name: Accessibility.WereAlwaysLooking
data.value: We’re always looking to improve the accessibility of this website. If you find any problems not listed on this page or think we’re not meeting accessibility requirements, contact:

data.name: Accessibility.WeveAlsoMade
data.value: We’ve also made the website text as simple as possible to understand.

data.name: Accessibility.WeWantAsMany
data.value: We want as many people as possible to be able to use this website. For example, that means that you should be able to:

data.name: Accessibility.ZoomIn
data.value: zoom in up to 400% without the text spilling off the screen

data.name: Accessibility.AbilityNet
data.value: AbilityNet

data.name: Accessibility.PageTitle
data.value: Accessibility statement for Regulator service

data.name: Accessibility.ThereAreIssuesWithKeyboard
data.value: there are issues with keyboard navigation, heading structure and error messages when creating an account or signing in

data.name: Accessibility.YoureAutomaticallySignedOut
data.value: you’re automatically signed out after a period of inactivity without warning or explanation

data.name: Accessibility.SomePageTitleMetaTags
data.value: some page title meta tags do not consistently describe the page content or match the page heading

data.name: Accessibility.DueToTheNonCompliances
data.value: , due to the non-compliances listed below.

data.name: Accessibility.TheContentListedBelow
data.value: The content listed below is non-accessible for the following reasons.

data.name: Accessibility.NonComplianceWithTheAccessibility
data.value: Non-compliance with the accessibility regulations

data.name: Accessibility.WhenCreatingAnAccount
data.value: When creating an account or signing in:

data.name: Accessibility.ThereAreSomeUnnecessarySteps
data.value: there are some unnecessary steps in the keyboard navigation order - this fails WCAG 2.1 success criterion 2.4.3 (focus order)

data.name: Accessibility.EachTimeAPageLoads
data.value: each time a page loads, the focus is not at the top of the page - this fails WCAG 2.1 success criterion 2.4.3 (focus order)

data.name: Accessibility.PageTitleMetaTags
data.value: page title meta tags do not consistently describe the page content or match the page heading - this fails WCAG 2.1 success criterion 2.4.2 (page titled)

data.name: Accessibility.SomeTextIsStyled
data.value: some text is styled as a heading but not marked up as a heading, so the sections may be difficult to understand or navigate using a screen reader - this fails WCAG 2.1 success criterion 1.3.1 (info and relationships)

data.name: Accessibility.ErrorMessagesDoNotAccurately
data.value: error messages do not accurately explain the error that occurred - this fails WCAG 2.1 success criterion 3.3.3 (error suggestion)

data.name: Accessibility.WhenYoureSignedOutAutomatically
data.value: When you’re signed out automatically after a period of inactivity, there is no warning. There is no option to extend or adjust the time period. This fails WCAG 2.1 success criterion 2.2.1 (timing adjustable). Also, the page shown after being signed out automatically does not explain what happened.

data.name: Accessibility.SomePageTitleMetaTagsThroughout
data.value: Some page title meta tags throughout the website do not consistently describe the page content or match the page heading. This fails WCAG 2.1 success criterion 2.4.2 (page titled).

data.name: Accessibility.WereWorkingThroughTheseIssues
data.value: We’re working through these issues and intend to fix them by September 2024.

data.name: Accessibility.NonAccessibleContent
data.value: Non-accessible content
